id.description: The ID of the API log event.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the API request.

apiKey.description: The API key used for authentication.

userIp.description: The IP address of the user who performed the API request.

httpMethod.description: The HTTP method of the API request (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.).

url.description: The URL of the API endpoint that was called.

requestBody.description: The request body sent with the API request.

responseBody.description: The response body received from the API.

statusCode.description: The HTTP status code of the API response.

requestHeaders.description: The headers sent with the API request.

responseHeaders.description: The headers received in the API response.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the API request was made.
